{{Flavour|A very large and vicious-looking carnivorous frog. Its knobbly brown skin blends in with the rough rock of your surroundings.}}

==Useful info==

A '''giant toad''' is essentially the big brother of the [[giant frog]], although it's nowhere near as deadly as the [[spiny frog]]. Unlike the [[water moccasin]], it's not poison resistant. These frogs are worth three times the [[XP]] of their green counterparts. They can be found in the Dungeon, but the most likely place to find one is in [[the Lair]].

==Tips and tricks==

==History==
Giant toads were removed in [[0.10]].
